title: God, revelation of
comment: God graciously makes himself known to humanity since people cannot discover him on their own. He achieves this in many ways, but supremely through his Son Jesus Christ.

children.title: God is hidden from human view because of sin

cschildren.title: The means by which God reveals himself
The nature of God's self-revelation in Jesus Christ

children.title: God reveals Jesus Christ's true identity
Jesus Christ is the visible image of God
Jesus Christ's glory is still to be fully revealed

secondaryrefs.comment: the LORD shows his glory to Moses

primaryrefs.comment: ``mystery'' in the NT means ``something previously hidden, undiscoverable by human means but now revealed by God''.

children.title: Physical means by which God reveals his will
God's self-revelation makes his will plain

cschildren.title: God's self-revelation is according to his own sovereign purpose
